title: Abu Dhabi National Oil Company
summary: The Abu Dhabi National Oil Company (Arabic: شركة بترول أبوظبي الوطنية‎) or ADNOC is the state-owned oil company of the United Arab Emirates (UAE). It is the world's 12th largest oil company by production.[2] As of 2021, the company has an oil production capacity exceeding 4 million b/d with plans to increase to 5 million bpd by 2030.[3][4] It is the United Arab Emirate's largest oil company.[5][6][7]
